mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as delayNum, environmental_gsvehicle.cxId, environmental_gsvehicle.deptId, environmental_gsvehicle.deptName, environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_TIME_, bpm_inst.STATUS_ AS STATUS from environmental_gsvehicle LEFT JOIN os_rel_inst ON environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_BY_ = os_rel_inst.PARTY2_ LEFT JOIN os_group ON os_rel_inst.PARTY1_ = os_group.GROUP_ID_ LEFT JOIN os_user ON os_user.USER_ID_ = environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_BY_ LEFT JOIN bpm_inst ON environmental_gsvehicle.cxId = bpm_inst.BUS_KEY_ where os_rel_inst.REL_TYPE_KEY_ = 'GROUP-USER-BELONG' AND os_rel_inst.DIM1_ = '1' and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) >= date(environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_TIME_) and bpm_inst.STATUS_ ='RUNNING' GROUP BY environmental_gsvehicle.deptId

SELECT count(*) as yearNum, DATE_FORMAT(environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_TIME_,'%Yå¹´') as yearName FROM environmental_gsvehicle LEFT JOIN os_rel_inst ON environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_BY_ = os_rel_inst.PARTY2_ LEFT JOIN os_group ON os_rel_inst.PARTY1_ = os_group.GROUP_ID_ LEFT JOIN os_user ON os_user.USER_ID_ = environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_BY_ LEFT JOIN bpm_inst ON environmental_gsvehicle.cxId = bpm_inst.BUS_KEY_ WHERE os_rel_inst.REL_TYPE_KEY_ = 'GROUP-USER-BELONG' AND os_rel_inst.DIM1_ = '1' AND bpm_inst.STATUS_='SUCCESS_END' group BY YEAR ( environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_TIME_)

SELECT count(*) as monthNum, DATE_FORMAT(environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_TIME_,'%Y-%m') as monthName FROM environmental_gsvehicle LEFT JOIN os_rel_inst ON environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_BY_ = os_rel_inst.PARTY2_ LEFT JOIN os_group ON os_rel_inst.PARTY1_ = os_group.GROUP_ID_ LEFT JOIN os_user ON os_user.USER_ID_ = environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_BY_ LEFT JOIN bpm_inst ON environmental_gsvehicle.cxId = bpm_inst.BUS_KEY_ WHERE os_rel_inst.REL_TYPE_KEY_ = 'GROUP-USER-BELONG' AND os_rel_inst.DIM1_ = '1' AND bpm_inst.STATUS_='SUCCESS_END' and DATE_FORMAT(environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_TIME_,'%Y-%m') >=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 month),'%Y-%m') group BY DATE_FORMAT( environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_TIME_,'%Y-%m' )

SELECT count( * ) AS modelNum, brand FROM ( SELECT environmental_gsvehicle.fdjzzs AS brand, environmental_gsvehicle.cpjxxh AS model FROM environmental_gsvehicle LEFT JOIN os_rel_inst ON environmental_gsvehicle.CREATE_BY_ = os_rel_inst.PARTY2_ LEFT JOIN bpm_inst ON environmental_gsvehicle.cxId = bpm_inst.BUS_KEY_ WHERE os_rel_inst.REL_TYPE_KEY_ = 'GROUP-USER-BELONG' AND os_rel_inst.DIM1_ = '1' AND bpm_inst.STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' GROUP BY environmental_gsvehicle.fdjzzs, environmental_gsvehicle.cpjxxh ) tmp GROUP BY brand ORDER BY modelNum DESC
